DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether functional electrical impedance tomography is suitable for examination of double-lumen tube placement compared with fibreoptic evaluation.
DOC.brief_title: Examination of Double-Lumen Tube Placement by Functional Electrical Impedance Tomography
DOC.criteria: consent of the patient intubation with left or rightsided doublelumen tube age >= 18 years refusal by the patient contraindications for EITmeasurement (e.g. pacemaker, pregnancy)
